S.FORM: 140 amihcan hanca matenes tuwaca 140 kakiliiman 140 amihcan hanca matenes tuwaca, nika makadateng tina kawawan haw, cuenut tu ku balucu' ahican a caay pakadateng, ahican amupawan ku tuka nu balucu' kya acaay tu kalalum ku balucu'. hanca mahida tu amin kuni dateng nu pinacadan. nika paymihmihcan katukuhan tu ku puu' nu mihcan sa makadateng tu tina kawawan, ahayni kabelec kya tawya amapawan. 140 cuenut tu ku balucu' ahican a caay pakadateng . nilacul namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan(
